body: I was banned for no reason. It says i was banned for fly hacking When i was using  OPTIFINE? Can I be Unbanned I Did not do anything?
body_tagged: I was banned for no reason. It says i was banned for fly hacking When i was using  OPTIFINE? Can I be Unbanned I Did not do anything?
title: Banned?

replies.body: If you believe you have been falsely banned, email support@avicus.net and state your username + what happened.
replies.body_tagged: If you believe you have been falsely banned, email support@avicus.net and state your username + what happened.

replies.body: E-mail support@avicus.net stating why you were banned, or contact a manager or director: http://avicus.net/staff via Skype.
replies.body_tagged: E-mail support@avicus.net stating why you were banned, or contact a manager or director: http://avicus.net/staff via Skype.

replies.body: I saw you blatantly fly hacking, so did emerald.
replies.body_tagged: I saw you blatantly fly hacking, so did emerald.
